AISettings._description: Azure OpenAI configuration. This project uses TWO models: (1) Codex for code generation agents, (2) Chat for portal Q&A and reports.
AISettings._modelArchitecture: Codex models use Responses API, Chat models use Chat Completions API. See Agents/Infrastructure/ for implementations.
AISettings._codexSection: === CODEX MODEL (Responses API) - Used by all migration agents ===
AISettings._perAgentModels: Optional: Override model per agent (defaults to ModelId if not set)
AISettings._chatSection: === CHAT MODEL (Chat Completions API) - Used by portal and RE reports ===
AISettings._authNote: Leave ApiKey empty to use Azure AD/Entra ID authentication (DefaultAzureCredential)
AISettings._contextWindowNote: Set ContextWindowSize to override model detection. e.g. 128000 for gpt-4o/gpt-5. If set, disables magic string checking.

RateLimitSettings._description: Rate limiting to prevent Azure API throttling (429 errors).
RateLimitSettings._howToSet: TokensPerMinute should match your Azure OpenAI quota (Portal → Resource → Model deployments → TPM)
RateLimitSettings._retryNote: RetryDelayMs: Wait time after 429 error. MinDelayBetweenRequestsMs: Minimum gap between requests.

ApplicationSettings._description: General application paths and target language configuration

Neo4j._description: Neo4j graph database for dependency visualization

ChunkingSettings._description: Smart chunking for large COBOL files (>150K chars or >3K lines). Splits files into manageable pieces for LLM processing.
ChunkingSettings._whenTriggered: Files exceeding MaxLinesOfCode or 150K characters are automatically chunked.

ConversionSettings._description: Controls how COBOL names are converted to Java/C# names and code consistency.
ConversionSettings._namingOptions: Hybrid=business-meaningful | PascalCase | camelCase | Preserve=keep COBOL names

AssemblySettings._description: File organization settings. SplitStrategy: SingleFile, ClassPerFile, FilePerChunk, LayeredArchitecture

Layers._description: Layer settings for LayeredArchitecture split strategy
